tool_description: Scans directories recursively to inventory files with filtering options and generates comprehensive file lists for batch processing.

directory_path.description: Root directory path to scan for files

file_extensions.description: Array of file extensions to include (e.g., ['pdf', 'jpg', 'xml'])

max_depth.description: Maximum directory depth to scan (-1 for unlimited)

min_file_size.description: Minimum file size in bytes to include

max_file_size.description: Maximum file size in bytes to include

include_hidden.description: Whether to include hidden files and directories

exclude_patterns.description: Array of regex patterns for files/directories to exclude

error_messages: Directory not found: The specified directory path does not exist
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to read the directory
Invalid depth: max_depth must be -1 or a positive integer
Invalid size range: min_file_size cannot be greater than max_file_size
Invalid regex pattern: One or more exclude_patterns contains invalid regex syntax
usage: Specify directory_path and optionally filter by file_extensions, size limits, depth, and exclude patterns to generate a comprehensive file inventory.

total_files.description: Total number of files found matching criteria

file_paths.description: Array of full file paths found during scan

total_size.description: Combined size of all found files in bytes

scan_duration.description: Time taken to complete scan in seconds
